note.p: Birth: Benvie, near Dundee, Angus, Scotland (10 March 1748)

Career: Licensed as a minister (1770); minister, parish of Liff (1773-1782); Joint Professor of Mathematics,Edinburgh University (1785-1805); Professor of Natural Philosophy, Edinburgh University (1805)
References: J B Morrell, 'Professors Robison and Playfair, and the Theophobia Gallica: Natural Philosophy, Religion and Politics in Edinburgh, 1789-1815' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 43-63
